alert.note: Alert for Mahnomen (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 8:54AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Minnesota, including the following counties, Mahnomen and Norman. * WHEN...Until 1115 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 853 AM CDT, emergency management and the Minnesota Department of Transportation reported of road closures and water on roadways in Norman and Mahnomen County. Flooding is expected to become more widespread as snowmelt continues.
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
